attributes.title: Worst most fraudulent, spam app I’ve ever downloaded
attributes.review: I’ve never had a worse app in my life. This app has made my financial apps act very strange and my phone has been very glitchy. And ever since I downloaded it, I have been getting strange phone calls from people claiming to have all of my social security and bank information.

attributes.title: Worst app ever, this app is inappropriate
attributes.review: When I opened the app I was horrified by the man on the front he looks like a Cheeto and my precious little angel started crying at the sight of it. Worst images ever are shown on this app including inappropriate ones. This app gives children nightmares and adults. I could compare it the the ring horror movie and it includes nude photos in this app. Disgusting!

attributes.title: VERY unsatisfactory😡
attributes.review: i downloaded it and saw a very disgusting goblin when I opened it?? someone named dump. I was trying to get information to use against- er uh I mean to support our lovely president but all I got was some weird looking dude begging for money to beat Bidens daily donation record. kinda sad if you ask me. bunker boy had made plenty of mistakes✨🧚‍♀️🌸thats it. he makes a lot of mistakes

attributes.title: It’s worse than Fox 11
attributes.review: This is the most slow, inaccurate, and lacking notable political events app to ever exist. It hasn’t been updating and seeks to have a new platform. I had to delete it after just 5 days because of how inaccurate the timing and updates were. Clearly the app was constructed to release info and fails to do so...

attributes.title: I don’t understand?
attributes.review: Every time I click on to the app it immediately kicks me out. One time i actually go through to the page but there were crazy ads!! It wouldn’t even let me click out of the ads. Don’t download! it will make your phone soooo slow!! If i could give it zero stars i would.

attributes.title: disrespectful!
attributes.review: i went on the app and it said that the app is racist ? and i cant open it since i said i’m an immigrant?? it shows that the app does not supprt the BLM movement! it also tells us that white previlege does not exist for some reason ?? and the creator of this app seems to no like the LGBTQ people ands treats them different like any other? that’s bs. please get a better update.

attributes.title: YUCKY
attributes.review: Ugh so I downloaded this app On my way to go seduce a 👧🏼 but I literally tripped over a feminist and fell face first into the yellow paint being used to repaint the black lives matter letters that were painted over in black paint  🤬 Now how am I suppose to support All lives matter 🤬 all I wanted was to treat women like objects. Ugh. You can find me on Facebook sharing confederate flag posts- YOU WONT FIND ME ON THIS APP

attributes.title: This app will give you COVID-19!!!!!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep in touch with our great President Trump, and then I went to the beach with my family without a mask because that’s MY constitutional right, and then I tested positive for the Coronavirus!! President Trump’s app can’t keep you safe from the Coronavirus because HE CANT EITHER!!! HE’S A TERRIBLE PRESIDENT AND A FAILURE!!! This app will get you SICK and you should NOT DOWNLOAD IT!!!!! 😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😡😡😡😡😡😡😡🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: This app is terrible in the entirety. 1st the second i downloaded the app it said it needed my phone number or for me to register to use the app. There is no reason for this. 2nd this app uses your location at all times which is incredibly unnecessary and intrusive if you ask me. If I could give this a zero i would.

attributes.title: Hate crime
attributes.review: This app is absolutely TERRIBLE! As soon as I opened up the app, my entire phone went into lockdown mode convinced the Cheeto on the front would control everything! I finally got it unlocked and it said some nasty things to me because I’m a woman. NEVER get this app unless you want to feel worthless! Also this app put my sister in a coma.
